channel.title: The Feywild on tlake.io
channel.description: Recent content in The Feywild on tlake.io

item.title: An Ice Cold Drink
item.description: The party encounters a powerful winter fey whom Oneshoe antagonizes, Gray gambles with his friends, and Finn fights a huge jackrabbit man for some special booze.

item.title: Dwynwen
item.description: Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Slain by the Prince of Frost. Relationships Eiddwyn’s and Soliyandar’s daughter. Ffywellyn’s mother. Quotations Trivia

item.title: Eiddwyn
item.description: Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Passed away, kind of - she joined Soliyandar in his eternal tree-sleep. In her slumber, what’s left of her has become the Briarheart. Her form can be faintly seen within the contours of the great tree at the center of the Briarheart, entwined with that of Soliyandar’s.

item.title: Ffywellyn
item.description: Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Has sworn a vow of enmity against the Prince of Frost, who killed her mother Dwynwen. Val gave Ffywellyn the Soliyandar bow after the familial connection was made.

item.title: Vision Quest
item.description: After the shared experience of Lady Mayweather, the parties visions diverge to mostly unsettling ends. Gimble and Nyx need assistance recovering, and the party seeks guidance from Lady Tiandra.

item.title: Spring Break
item.description: Horns has an overnight adventure with the local druids, Gimble succeeds in getting a glimpse of Finn’s lost family, and an audience with Lady Tiandra leads the party to a vision quest.

item.title: Seasonal Destinations
item.description: Willoughby flies the party to a quick stop near Summer before narrowly avoiding the Wild Hunt on the way towards the Spring Court. A mostly exhausted party pushes on and enters the domain of spring, finding lodging and a possible audience with the Spring Court.

item.title: Soliyandar? More Like "So Long, Yandar!"
item.description: Val communes with the Briarheart, and in a bittersweet and selfless moment, gives Soliyandar to Ffywellyn. Horns casts plant growth and learns that Winter is not so easily forfended. Finn finally leads the party to the fey crossing to rendezvous with Willoughby the Whether Gnome, and they patch together a plan of action: ride on the back of Willoughby to the Spring Court, stopping only briefly to gain a new transport via plants location near the Summer Court on the way.

item.title: Of Fire, Water, Branch and Bow
item.description: The party finds themselves stuck within the bounds of a magical forest. After trying unsuccessfully to fight their way out, they are confronted by the young guardian of forest, who desperately needs their help.

item.title: Tom
item.description: Description Companion of Ffywellyn in the hut at the Briarheart. Appearance One of the Tuatha de Danaan, Tom is a humanoid rabbit with black fur. Personality Biography Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Go Shawty
item.description: The party is whisked away to celebrate a birthday with a DJ who doesn’t take No for an answer.

item.title: New Nyx, Who Dis?
item.description: Horns magically restores Nyx, but she awakens without memory of the party or the last several years. This Nyx claims to be a young orphan fleeing from Mirea. The group stops for shelter, Gimble receives divination from a troubling source, and an envoy brings a message and gift for Finn.

item.title: Frozen
item.description: The party finds itself back in the Feywild, much changed. Winter reigns. Nyx remains unresponsive. A frigid night brings visions. Gray recounts the danger of the Wild Hunt. Hoping for options, the group heads towards a fey crossing and reaches out to friends for answers.

item.title: Scattered Away
item.description: Timber proves to be a powerful foe, and a panicked Nyx sets up a desperate escape. Zed hangs back long enough to flirt with Mountain, and Bullwinkle heroically buys the party some time.

item.title: Tasha
item.description: Description Appearance Personality Biography AKA: Iggwilv Zybilna Tasha Natasha The Witch-Queen Ruler of the domain of delight known as Prismeer. Creator of the Demonomicon. Consort/prisoner/master of Graz’zt. Adopted daughter of Baba Yaga.

item.title: of motorcycles and newtonian physics
item.description: The Menagerie approach Arkhan’s tower and, upon seeing it guarded by a dragon, decide to recuperate and gather their strength instead of rushing in. Gimble casts identify on the orb of dragonkind. Gray is paid a visit by the Raven Queen who delivers an intercepted letter and a warning against the Feywild. A devilish warband starts a fight, and the party makes a new drow acquaintance.
